reviewGeneral.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Summary","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-5"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Ais is a frontline damage dealer that focuses on dealing damage through her basic attacks. She has high base stats and notably high movement speed.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Most of Ais damage comes from the [Enhancement] state she gains through Special and Ultimate skills. While enhanced her basic attack has a massively improved damage multiplier and does 5% of the current target's HP. Importantly, current HP damage triggers on every hit of her basic attack and she hits 4 times per animation, adding up to ~20% current HP% per animation. This damage  is further increased by gear, as DMG% lines scale %-based damage.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"PVE Review","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-5"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Ais has potential use cases in any PVE content that has tanky non boss enemies while also providing good auto attack damage such as Dive or Last Stand.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"PVP Review","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-5"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Ais is played as an aggressive rush unit, leveraging her movement speed and massive damage output to overwhelm the opponent. Combination of high damage multipliers and massive current HP% damage means that she can deplete any HP bar in seconds. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The only way to survive Ais is to not die from damage. To name a few options - Veronica, Jaina Kropel and base Horizon can all survive the absurd damage output represented by Ais and let you deploy a dedicated striker killer.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"It is worth noting that as most of Ais damage comes from [Enhancement], if she does not have special ready when deployed (e.g. redeploy situations) she offers close to nothing for her cost.\n","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

pros.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Highest consistent current HP% damage dealer in the game ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

baseDescription.baseDescription: Uses her Desperate and deals damage to a single target in front.

A basic attack in [Enhancement] state becomes an enhanced attack, inflicting AoE damage in front. For each hit, enhanced attacks deal additional damage equal to 5% of the current target's HP (Bosses excluded). Becomes immune to Hitstun from Special or lower skills while casting an enhanced attack.
Enhancement] ATK +30% and DMG RES Penetration +50% for 10 seconds (Cannot be canceled), recovers 0.6% of Max HP when hit in [Enhancement] state.

level5.level5: Immune to Stun while casting an enhanced attack

baseDescription.baseDescription: Enters [Enhancement] state, inflicting AoE damage around herself.
Enters [Enhancement] state and charges forward to inflict AoE damage. Enters Sure Fire mode for 12 seconds, after casting skill.
